costOfWord.title: The Cost of Your Word
costOfWord.bullet1: The service is free for you if you study every day.

title: Title

Headers.AddPayment: You need to add payment method

Popup.Delete: Are you sure you want to delete this payment method?
Popup.Enable: Do you want to enable subscription?
Popup.Disable: Are you sure you want to disable subscription?

Subscriptions.ActiveSubscriptionUntil: You have an active subscription. Next charge will be at {until}.
Subscriptions.ActiveSubscriptionPaymentMethod: You have an active subscription until {until}. You need to add a payment method to continue using the service.
Subscriptions.ActiveSubscriptionPaused:
You disabled subscription renewal but your current subscription is active until {until}.
You need to enable subscription to continue using the service after your current subscription ends.
Subscriptions.EndedSubscriptionUntil: Your subscription has ended. It was active until {until}.
Subscriptions.FirstSubscription: Please add an payment method to activate subscription.
Subscriptions.FailedProlong: Failed to prolong subscription. Please check your payment methods and try again

frequency-percent-tooltip-reading-html: This reading used in {value}% cases

StudyMessages.PaidCongratulations: Congratulations! You have reached your goal.
StudyMessages.PaidAlmostThere: A little bit more! You need to study for at least { minutes } more minutes to reach your goal.
StudyMessages.Congratulations: Congratulations! You have reached your goal and the service is free for today.
StudyMessages.AlmostThere: A little bit more! You need to study for at least { minutes } more minutes, otherwise the service will cost you { penalty } for today.

TheAveragePersonStudiesDescription: how many minutes are people studying on average
BEST1Description: how many minutes are people studying from best 1%
PenaltyZoneDescription: if you studied less than { penaltyMinutes } minutes then you’ll be charged { penalty } per day
AtTheSameRateInYear: At the same rate in a year
StudiedTimeUnknown: { date }: before you started using the service.
StudiedTimePenalty: { date }: was charged { penalty }, because you studied less than { penaltyMinutes } minutes ({ minutes } minutes).
StudiedTimePenaltyPayed: { date }: You didn't reach your goal because you studied for less than { penaltyMinutes } minutes.
StudiedTimePenaltyToday: { date }: studied today for { minutes } min. You will be charged { penalty } if you do not study for an additional { differenceMinutes } min.
StudiedTimePenaltyTodayPayed: { date }: studied today for { minutes } min. You need to study an additional { differenceMinutes } min to reach your daily goal.

registration.title: Enter your card details
registration.descriptionFree: We will not charge your card if you do not miss any study days. If you miss a day or study less than 10 minutes, we'll charge {value} for each missed day.
registration.descriptionTemplate: Once you add your card, you will be charged {value} {period}.

Support.title: Support
Support.description: Please fill out the form below to contact support. We'll answer you by email.

Payment required to continue using the s: Payment required to continue using the service.

Monthly.Label: Monthly Plan
Monthly.Offer: No fees for missed days for {value} per month

Promise.Label: Promise Plan
Promise.Offer: If you miss a day, you will be charged a fee of {value} per day for each missed day (customizable).
Promise.Note: This rate is the most effective for learning, you will definitely not forget and your progress will be maximized!
Promise.Condition: Free of charge if you meet the conditions

Annual.Label: Annual Plan
Annual.Offer: No fees for missed days for {value} per year (40% discount).
